SummaryEnglish: A factory explosion plunges a small town into a timeless freeze, leaving teenage Masamune and his pals to grapple with a quickly collapsing reality.
Aliases: Alice to Teresu no Maboroshi Kōjō
Alice to Teresu no Maboroshi Koujou
Alice to Therese no Maboroshi Koujou
The Illusion Factory of Alice and Therese
